content:
FedEx Developer Portal will experience interruption from 07/13/2024, 9:00 PM CT - 07/14/2024, 2:00 AM CT.
We apologize for any inconvenience such as slow response or technical difficulties. Thank you for your patience!

Menu
 Developer Portal
Guides

Welcome to FedEx APIs! Explore popular guides and review common references that can help during your API integration.

 

Best practices

Learn about best practices from FedEx APIs to create comprehensive and efficient API integrations.

MORE ON BEST PRACTICES

Organization administration

See how organizations can be used to handle project details along with managing users, accounts, keys and more.

LEARN ABOUT ORGANIZATIONS

FedEx API versioning

Discover how we manage our API versions and throttle their use.

MORE ON VERSIONING

Why migrate?

Read about why you should migrate to FedEx APIs and how the FedEx Developer Portal can help you.

LEARN ABOUT MIGRATION

Reference Guide

Learn about references that will be useful in building your API transactions.

MORE ON REFERENCE GUIDE

Quotas & rate limits

Learn about the throttling mechanisms for FedEx APIs.

LEARN ABOUT QUOTAS & RATE LIMITS

API Sandbox Virtualization

Read about Virtualization of the sandbox environment response that will speed up testing and improve move to production efforts.

LEARN ABOUT SANDBOX VIRTUALIZATION

Pricing

Learn more about pricing for our premium data solutions like Shipment Visibility Webhook.

LEARN ABOUT PRICING

Are you an existing Web Services or FedEx Ship Manager Server Customer? If so, you can still access the Developer Resource Center.
